glossary.search.text=Search... glossary.search.submit = Search glossary.search.title = Search Glossary... glossary.add.title = Add Glossary Item... glossary.add.searchHint = Glossary Item.... glossary.add.submit = Add Glossary Item glossary.export.title=Export the Glossary... glossary.export.submit.csv=Export as CSV glossary.export.id=Glossary ID glossary.export.locale.default=Default language glossary.export.csv.content=Content in {0} glossary.about= Glossary Application glossary.need = Please login or register glossary.noAnswer = No answer has been provided yet for this Glossary entry. Register on this wiki and edit this page to add an answer to this Glossary entry. glossary.sheet = This class sheet must be applied on a page containing a GlossaryCode.GlossaryClass object
glossary.technical = Contains technical pages for the Glossary application. glossary.list = Pages
Glossary.Code.GlossaryClass_title=Title Glossary.Code.GlossaryClass_definition=Definition
# Configuration keys admin.glossary=Glossary
Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_defaultGlossaryId=Default Glossary space Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_defaultGlossaryId.hint=Space where the default glossary entries are located Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_updateDocumentsOnSave=Update documents on save Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_updateDocumentsOnSave.hint=Indicates whether glossary entries found in page content should be transformed to links to the glossary on save Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_activateTransformationJob=Activate the periodic transformation of glossary entries into links Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_activateTransformationJob.hint=If activated, pages get updated periodically with links to the glossary entries found in their content. The default period is one day, it can be controlled from the Scheduler space. Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_transformationJobIncludeSpaces=List of spaces where the periodic transformation is active Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_transformationJobIncludeSpaces.hint=List of space names separated by a comma where glossary entries are periodically turned into links. Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_incrementVersionOnTransformationJob=Increment page version when links get added by the periodic transformation Glossary.Code.GlossaryConfigurationClass_incrementVersionOnTransformationJob.hint=Indicates whether a new page version should be created when links to glossary entries get automatically added by the periodic transformation.
glossary.transformationJob.save.message=Update links to glossary
